Class Employee

java.lang.Object
Employee
Direct Known Subclasses:
Fulltime, Parttime
public class Employee
extends java.lang.Object
Employee class represents an abstract data type Employee, which models any employee in a real life situation. Each employee is designed with a profile (abstract data type with name, date hired,and department), a payment number, and a decimal formatter. Multiple Employees will be held by the Company Class.

    • equals

      Overriden equals method compares two Employees and determines if they equal.

      equals in class java.lang.Object
